Items.item_name: Vanish Oxi Action Fabric Stain Remover Detergent Powder, 1kg
Items.item_description: Description : Vanish Oxi Action Powder with Oxi Powerlift removes even tough dried in stains. Ensuring that you are left with stain free laundry 1st time every time! Have you seen a stain on your clothes that you can't seem to remove? Don't fear! Vanish Oxi Action contains Oxi Powerlift which removes all types of stains, from the ones you can clearly see to the tougher ones that may be hidden. How to Remove Stains with Vanish Oxi Action Powder Removing stains from your clothes and other fabrics is easier than you think with Vanish Oxi Action. Washing Machine For tough and dried stains: Add one scoop of Vanish to your laundry detergent in the washing machine drawer and wash as usual. For normal stains add 1/2 a scoop. Wash as usual. Get great results also at 30 degrees. Soaking For tough and dried stains: Fully dissolve 1 scoop of the Vanish Oxi Action Powder into 4 litres of warm water (max 40 °C) and leave it to soak. For lighter stains, you can use 1/2 a scoop. Leave to soak for a maximum of 6 hours. After soaking, wash as usual or rinse thoroughly. For best results on tough stains, rub the stains out of the clothes before rinsing. Pre-Treat Mix 1/4 scoop of powder with 3/4 scoop of warm water (max 40 °C) into a paste. How to Use: - Begin by wetting the Vileda Glitzi Spiral Stainless Steel Scrubber under running water. - Apply your choice of cleaning liquid or soap to the scrubber. - Scrub the intended surface in a circular pattern or as needed until the dirt or residue is fully removed. - Once finished cleaning, thoroughly rinse the scrubber under running water to remove any residual soap or cleanser. - Squeeze out any excess water from the scrubber before storing. Product Description: Unleash your creative prowess or pen down your professional thoughts with the vibrant Zebra AX5 0.5 Green Pen. This pen is more than just a traditional writing tool, it is a blend of style, functionality and top-tier comfort. Sporting a sleek design, the Zebra AX5 is equipped with a fine 0.5 mm tip that delivers smooth and flawless green ink flow for creating precise lines. Its sturdy plastic body promises long-term durability, while an advanced grip ensures a pain-free writing experience, even through extended use. This pen is ideal for artists, students, professionals, and anyone who appreciates high-quality writing tools. How to Use: 1. Unpack your new Zebra AX5 0.5 Green Pen carefully from its packaging. 2. Remove the cap located at the top of the pen. 3. Hold the pen comfortably in your preferred hand. Make sure to grip the pen in a way that the tip is pointing downwards. 4. Apply the pen to paper in a gentle, smooth motion to start writing or drawing. 5. Recap the pen after each use to prevent the ink from drying. Storage Instructions: 1. Store your Zebra AX5 0.5 Green Pen in a cool and dry place avoiding extreme temperatures to ensure the ink doesn't dry out or leak. 2. Always replace the pen cap after use. 3. It's best not to store the pen with the tip facing upwards to avoid ink retreat, which may affect the quality of writing. 4. Keep the pen out of the reach of young children when not in use. Materials: 1. High-quality, durable plastic body 2. Smooth flowing, vibrant green ink 3. Fine metal-clad 0.5 mm tip 4. Comfortable grip material.

Product description: Indomie Mi Goreng is an instant noodles product line made under the Indomie brand by the Indofood company, the world's largest instant noodle manufacturer, located in Indonesia. Mi Goreng is Indonesian for "fried noodle". Indomie Mi Goreng is simply abbreviated as Indomie goreng by most Indonesians. Indomie Goreng is a type of instant noodle served without soup and is stirred well with soysauce, oil, and seasoning. This instant noodle derived its inspiration from traditional Indonesian dish called mi goreng, a variant of fried noodle common in Indonesia. Cooking Instructions: • Empty Mie noodles into 300-400 ml of brisky boiling water & simmer for 3 minutes. • Add flavoring: Seasoning powder, seasoning oil, chili powder and stir gently until dissolved. • Indomie is Ready to be served.
